resources.string: TicTacDoe Android game! Different boards, ads free!

1. The game is played on a grid that's Z squares by Z squares. The Z value can be from 2 to 12.

 2. You are X, computer is O, or vice versa. Players take turns putting their marks in empty squares.

 3. The first player to get Z of marks in a row (up, down, across, or diagonally) is the winner.

 4. When all squares are full, the game is over. If no player has Z marks in a row, the game ends in a draw.
